DataElement.preferredName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite 16 Past 4 Weeks Overall How Big a Problem Have Your Bowel Habits Been Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Person's stated observation in the past 4 weeks overall how big a problem their bowel habits have been, using a 5 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Expanded Prostate Cancer Index Composite Past 4 Weeks Overall How Big a Problem Have Your Bowel Habits Been Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to evaluate patient function and bother after prostate cancer treatment._A period of time consisting of the 28 days before the present._A question about an individual's overall assessment of how big a problem their bowel habits have been._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Overall, how big a problem ha
ReferenceDocuments.description: Overall, how big a problem have your bowel habits been for you during the last 4 weeks?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents. In cases where retaining the question set intact to preserve the validity and reliability are not as important as advancing the science, questions may be used individually or in combination with other measure questions.
